title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 204.19 - Certification course auditing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 204.19 - Certification course auditing

State Regulations
A duly authorized representative of the division may audit
any course offered and may verify attendance and inspect the records of
attendance of the course at any time during its presentation or
thereafter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
204.19

Adopted

New

York State Register August 7, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 32, eff. 8/7/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
